release_note: Fix opening attachments leaving attachment in loading state in certain cases Plugin system improvements and fixes
Add toolbar button when text is selected for extract content options and replaceText plugin actions Show toolbar buttons for highlight and strikethrough when cursor is in a list item
Use to link to other notes as an easier to type alternative to Misc. note content editor fixed and improvements Additional plugin feature support

Fix templates being listed multiple times in quick search results Improve caching of external calendar events for display in widgets Fix for plugin indicator errantly showing after app has been in background for a long time Fix for plugins not showing up in rare cases after app has been in the background

When opening a link to a heading scroll down so the heading is at the top of the screen Fix for rare state where note updates aren t downloaded immediately after app has been in background for a long time Misc. editor and plugin system improvements
Fix certain Apple Calendar events preventing calendar from loading Pending changes to a note that has been made readonly will be copied to a new note allowing sync to continue without delay
Increase speed of background note content updating when there are multiple notes to update Fix Apple Calendar events in other timezones using incorrect time
Various widget fixes and improvements Additional plugin support Fix completed blank tasks obscuring other completed tasks on calendar

Add indicator when a plugin action is running Fix repeating instances of events on connected Apple calendars not showing up on calendar Fix images attached in quick todo or share to note not uploading
Add navigation history menu for quick navigation to previously viewed areas and notes
Handle sharing PDFs from Notes app notes to Amplenote Fix typing in quick add task input on iPhone SE not showing input
Fix all day tasks from external calendars not being shown on the calendar in some cases

Allow expand collapse of header sections When viewing a deleted note show the option to restore it Fix images videos not uploading to Rich Footnotes Fix crash on calendar screen when Google calendar all day event starts and ends at same second Allow expand collapse of header sections When viewing a deleted note show the option to restore it Fix images videos not uploading to Rich Footnotes Fix editor not scrolling to cursor position when using keyboard arrows on iPad

Display tasks on calendar using selected tag color of source note Fix some popup menus date suggestions note link menu etc being cut off in the quick to do input Fix expression suggestions menu not showing in the quick to do input Fix some Rich Footnote descriptions being cut off when viewed in tasks or calendar mode Fix archived notes not showing up in deleted notes list Move focus to blank line in note editor when pressing enter on keyboard from focused note title field Support additional plugin functionality
Update tag color picker with additional pre set options Additional plugin support Misc. bug fixes and minor improvements

Add calendar widget on iPad Assorted widget fixes and improvements Fix calendar icons on external calendar events not using the correct text color based on event background color Fix multi day events on external calendars only showing the first day in non monthly calendar views Fix multi day events on external calendars showing over too many days in monthly view
Show events on calendar from external calendars using the color set on the external calendar
Add Quick Actions home screen widget type Handle newlines in text shared to Amplenote via share extension
Add home screen agenda widgets Improvements to plugin support
Fix placement of Rich Footnote icon in iOS 16.4 Show completed tasks tab in past note versions as it would have appeared when that version was authored Add support for latest plugin features

Add agenda widgets of three sizes Enable support for plugins for Founder subscribers Add autocomplete menu when typing expressions Fix a case where an incorrect merge could occur when an open note with tasks in it was updated frequently while the app was in the background once the app was foregrounded on a new day Add highlight and strikethrough formatting options to editor toolbar Fix keyboard closing after linking to a note using in jots mode

Fix typing fast in an un persisted daily jot potentially dropping the second character typed Fix some cases where tapping on a notification would not highlight the corresponding task in the app Add support for attaching Word Excel and PowerPoint files via sharing to Amplenote Remove limit of 10 shortcuts per area Notes Jots Tasks etc Fix content inside angle brackets in note titles not showing in note suggestion lists

Add list of notes deleted in last 30 days after tags in sidebar Add dedicated option for archived notes after tags in sidebar removing default shortcut to archived notes Add setting to change first day of the week Fix calendar Task details screen not showing updated task attributes as they are changed Fix last time slot of calendar views being obscured by UI Quick to do or navigation elements Improve editor scrolling when sharing content to Amplenote
Pasting a link when text range is selected now creates a link Better handling of enter press at start of table row Fix task widget popups getting cut off at the bottom of the editor
Fix potential duplicate notifications after moving a task between notes
Fix editor toolbar springing back to start on tablet layouts Fix 3 pane tablet view cutting off editor in some cases
Fix rapid text entry in quick to do dropping characters in some cases Fix backspace at start of quick to do resulting in visual glitches Table fixes improvements
Initial table implementation for non Founders
Fix drawer status text overlapping content in some cases Fix drawer toggle button overlapping content on tablets in some cases

Add option to lookup tasks on search screen Allow filtering of Full Search results by tag and category Fix tapping time suggestion in start at field using entered time instead of tapped suggestion Fix completed tasks getting moved to today s daily jot with other open tasks Fix a case where a note is immediately un focused after placing the cursor in the note Fix a case where a particularly formed note could impact app performance

Add buttons to quickly jump between modes when focusing app Add syntax highlighting indentation and more to multi language code editor Fix uploading images videos in Rich Footnotes Fix jot note remaining open after deleting the note in a sub screen

Quick to do improvements Add option to select an image or video Add search for note to add to Add options to schedule for a specific time List additional task options that have been added e.g. via task menu !hide etc Restore add top bottom options removed in 3.48 Minor quick to do editor fixes and improvements Enable tables for Founders Misc bug fixes and minor improvements Fix a case where the Quick to do... bar could be missing after foregrounding the app Fix crash on right click in editor when running on macOS
Fix amplenote: notes NOTE UUID URLs not opening the specified note Fix a case where the newest note content from another device doesn t load immediately

Update Quick to do bar to use a full editor Misc. editor bug fixes and improvements Adjust report diagnostics option to clarify its purpose Handle amplenote: URLs e.g. amplenote: notes or amplenote: jots when opened in other apps Handle sharing device screenshots to Amplenote
Fix unreadable button in image options popup Handle PDF files shared from Files Handle PDF web files shared from Safari Handle sharing of multiple images or PDFs

Added effects when completing tasks Add some useful home screen quick actions long press on app icon Show an option to open the note new content was added to unless the note is already open Allow drawing over existing images. Tap an image to select it then tap drawing icon in the editor toolbar. Allow editing of existing drawings created in 3.46 or later drawings created in earlier versions will be treated as images .
Add options to center add a caption and manually size images Allow filtering a note s backlinks on tags and note references

Apply color theme chosen for account via web app Add option to save note reference filters on tasks screen Add option to save note reference filters in calendar tasks list Add option to change theme on settings screen Fix add task bar not showing after using editor toolbar button to hide keyboard

Fix editor sometimes scrolling unexpectedly when checking off a task Fix typing smileys : etc inserting non smiley characters Add filtering by note reference on tasks screen Add filtering by note reference in calendar tasks list

Add option to add drawings to notes when using an iPad Don t suggest locked notes with many tasks in jots suggestions Open calendar https: www.amplenote.com notes calendar tasks and jots links in app Indicate when no tag is applied on jots screen All notes shown
Fix potential crash on note security screen introduced in version 3.37 Fix crash when linking to a note in menu on calendar task details screen

Fix crash when pressing note name on calendar event details screen Fix pasting image files in editor not working Open note filter links e.g. https: www.amplenote.com notes tag daily jots in app instead of external browser Handle links to headings in same note by scrolling to heading and highlighting it Fix left side drawer menu growing too wide in some cases Improve performance of calendar 3 day and weekly views

Fix task due date not being clearable when editing a task s details on the calendar Display editor toolbars inline above editors on tablets and macOS Improve performance of calendar month view Fix a crash when placing the cursor in a jot when running on a mac
Fix a cause of duplicate notifications Add option for 3 pane layout tags notes list note in notes section on tablets Fix display of calendar day names in 3 day and weekly mode

Add 3 day weekly and monthly views for calendar Improve sizing of monthly calendar day selector on tablets Indicate on calendar where new task created via quick to do will be added Show various menus as popups on tablets rather than full screens
Improve handling of Chinese Japanese and Korean search text in full search Allow tags in alphabets without lower case characters like Chinese

Fix cross out option not crossing out child items Fix cross out option sometimes changing a crossed out child bullet to be un crossed out Hiding a parent task hides children Fix keyboard toolbar sometimes not showing up when editing a jot Fix first two numeric items both using number 1

Don t auto hide quick to do on note editor screen Fix the Edit details option on a task in calendar mode not showing the task s details Fix subscription required messages not being very readable on a dark background

Revamp all navigation to speed up app and reduce overall app size Add option to keep sidebar open on large iPad devices Fix tapping a task checkbox opening the keyboard when it wasn t already open Open quick search when pressing cmd o on an external keyboard Fix quick to do bar appearing in middle of screen after editing a note when running on a mac
Allow hybrid collapsible content bullets numbers tasks Fix typing in jot notes always scrolling to top note

Add option to cross out a task leaving it in place as a bullet list item when done Add option to specify time of day when hiding a task for a number of days using !hide task command Fix Configure your task domains message on calendar not being readable in dark mode Fix removing a note reference from a note not clearing out backlink in referenced note Allow Slide Over and Split View on iPad

Fix frequently repeated tasks more than 16 times in a month occasionally not showing up on calendar Fix a rare case where an oft repeated task could be duplicated when updating a note from a second client after a long hiatus
Fix tasks screen not showing note suggestions or uploading images. Add option enabled by default to show the source of each task on tasks screen.
Show suggested actions at the bottom of today s jot note
Fix typing on an empty line not inserting a horizontal rule Clarify limitations of basic and free accounts
Fix newly typed characters flickering in some cases on the tasks screen Don t show form to add a collaborator when note can t be shared
Fix crash when viewing source tags in calendar tasks list popup
Default to today s daily jot when using quick to do in jots mode List tags of currently selected note for quick to do

Improve handling of linking to headings by typing in Rich Footnote link input Don t suggest tags when typing web addresses or URLs in Rich Footnote link input Improve rendering of note headings when grouping by note on tasks screen
Fix Outlook calendar events with properties from other applications not showing up on calendar
Fix add user button overlapping permissions popup for existing shares Show shared ancestor tags on share tag screen Add option to archive all notes with a specific tag
Allow tags to be shared such that any note given that tag is shared Show tags in quick to do notes list
Update shortcuts when renaming a tag used in shortcuts

Indicate when other collaborators are editing a note Handle note set as default shortcut being deleted Handle tags parameters in new note links e.g. https: www.amplenote.com notes new tags tag subtag second tag Fix invite collaborators screen not loading in some cases
List note collaborators currently viewing editing a note Allow addition via note menu of shortcuts to notes in notes mode Fix setting a task to fixed repeat resetting start time in some cases

Add option to group tasks on tasks screen by note creator Fix handling of months before in hide until rules Show note creator if not current user on note details screen Allow addition removal of tags on notes that have been shared with you without edit access Fix tasks in duplicated notes not showing up in tasks calendar views. Fix tasks inserted with not showing up in tasks calendar views.

Add option to save a note as markdown Fix videos not displaying while uploading Show message when file is too large to be uploaded Show tasks due before the end of this week in Due this week tasks filter even if due before this week

Add support for inline videos Images and videos will now continue uploading in the background Improve handling of large file uploads Insert the content of a note instead of a link to the note when using name syntax instead of name . Remove errantly listed object Object tag in tags list on jots screen
Fix notifications for completed repeating tasks not being removed Add option to delete all notes with a given tag Add option to merge a tag into another tag Add tag menu button to sidebar
Fix custom duration text being cut off in task detail Fix crash when editing some tags

Add !duration task command Allow full display of 6 weeks of completed tasks specific ranges of days via filter menu on completed tasks tab Show count of notes including archived with each tag in side menu Only show tags that have notes with tasks when Tasks is the selected screen Add visual indicator of applied filters on quick open screen

Add option when scheduling tasks on calendar to temporarily override default duration for task domain Don t show full tag path for child tags in sidebar Show more details of Google Outlook events on calendar Don t show dismissed tasks on calendar Add option to show hide tasks in notes created by other users on tasks screen

Show completed tasks on calendar Fix tasks sometimes notifying multiple times particularly when tasks have been moved between notes Fix !move command not working on calendar task details screen Fix future instances of some repeating tasks showing on incorrect day on calendar Add missing task score colors to tasks displayed on calendar Fix tag text not allowing Cyrillic characters

Fix delete button in task detail Apply filter groups e.g. group:untagged and tags e.g. in:some tag in quick open search text List total note count including archived when no tag or filter has been applied on notes list screen Add option on by default to show all scheduled tasks in calendar views
Bullets and tasks can now be collapsed Links can now be created in Rich Footnote descriptions using markdown link syntax Fix editor not resizing when rotating device from portrait to landscape
Add option to drawer menu press your username to expand options to manually select light or dark mode Fix error when undoing input in note editor introduced in 2.58
Add dark mode Fix view button in notification after adding a task not opening the note the task was added to
Add calendar screen Add quick search entries for top level screens: calendar jots notes and tasks. Add quick search option to create a new copy when the first matching note is a locked note.
Fix crash introduced in 2.55 when entering text in quick open and tag name in tag input

Fix note editor not keeping cursor in view broken in version 2.54 Handle new note links https: www.amplenote.com notes new in app Tasks in locked notes are no longer included on the tasks screen List headings in current note to link to with

Add visual feedback when completing a task Fix task checkboxes being difficult to press and opening the keyboard Set when a task starts using the quick to do bar Fix image video attachment on tasks screen Fix deeply nested bullet list items not always starting at the first value Increase uploaded image size from a maximum of 800 by 600 to 1500 in both dimensions Improve handling of daily jots created at the same time on multiple devices Misc. editor improvements
Handle multiple notes with the same name in jots Improve performance and stability of jots
Fix daily notes older than a week sorting incorrectly in jots Misc. editor improvements
Fix an error when tapping on a notification with app in background

Update task due time to be called start time to better align with calendar usage Add option to sort tasks on tasks screen by start time Improve performance of tasks screen Fix application of existing tags changing tag color to blue Misc. editor improvements
Fix jots screen freezing in some cases when no tag is selected Misc. editor improvements

Fix Rich Footnote image not uploading correctly in some cases on the tasks screen Improve handling of background updates when device is locked Fix note editor screen top bar icons not appearing in some cases

Type with text selected to surround the selected text with note link brackets. Fix next instance of a recurring task not being created until opening the note if completed on tasks screen Misc. editor improvements Calendar synchronization improvements Tasks screen performance and stability improvements Fix notes not updating in the background in some cases when device is locked Fix editor keyboard shortcuts command b etc using control key instead of command key
Add support for syncing to multiple connected calendars
Fix linking to a heading linking to entire note instead Fix an error on startup for some users of the previous version

Jots and tasks shortcuts are now synchronized between all your devices Fix toolbar button to insert images in jots mode not opening image picker Fix toolbar not showing on jots screen in some cases Misc. editor improvements
Type a forward slash in the note link menu to autocomplete tags Fix potential crash when an invalid tag is encountered Fix crash when linking to a note with in tasks view Misc. editor improvements
Fix crash when changing tag color
Fix crash on tasks screen Minor editor improvements

Fix enter on search screen not opening the first note Show previews of YouTube and Twitter in Rich Footnote popups when no description has been provided Fix error undoing note deletion from popup notification
Type when linking to a note to link to a specific heading in the note Fix crash when navigating to a link on the tasks screen

The content of a linked note is now shown in the Rich Footnote popup when no description has been entered Add option to search for unlinked references to the backlinks section Add filtering by tag for notes shown in backlinks section

Add task commands menu: type ! after a space in a task to quickly change the task Improve visibility of task adjust buttons for the current task when the keyboard is open Fix potential crash when dismissing keyboard via toolbar on jots screen

Improve edit tag screen tap on the tag color circle when viewing a note Add blockquote and redo to editor toolbar Improve note editor on large screen iPad devices with Request Desktop Website enabled Improve performance of tasks screen for users with a very large number of tasks Fix potential to get logged out when app is in the background immediately after device is unlocked
Add jots functionality

Tasks can be scheduled for a general time of day e.g. morning or afternoon rather than a specific time Add support for notifications some time before a task is due Fix the behavior of return at the end of list items on iOS 14

Fix incorrect synchronization of Outlook calendar events in some cases Tasks screen refreshes updated note content in the background Added sync status and search button to tasks screen top bar Misc. note and tasks editor improvements

Add Unified Task List Fix images displaying at a fixed height Fix press on Task Detail expander button moving selection to start of next task Fix cursor getting stuck at the end of newly inserted links
Fix app always launching to notes list introduced in 2.28
Add option to un archive archived notes Misc note editor fixes and improvements
Allow editing of hidden task content Misc note editor fixes and improvements Fix potential for notes to be stuck showing pending upload of changes Show more context for backlinks in list hierarchies

Remember last selected note editor tab hidden completed backlinks per note Fix some note list display issues missing border extra white space unwrapped preview lines Fix some buttons not appearing rounded update styling of note history screen Misc note editor fixes and improvements
Add backlinks tab to bottom of note editor screen Fix text in tag inputs being white when device is in dark mode
Move hidden tasks to bottom tab next to completed tasks Dismissing a recurring task will now create recurring instances
Create links to other notes or a new note quickly with Minor note editor optimizations
Fix OCR text button on images not inserting text Handle unnecessary merging when three sequential changes are timed correctly Misc note editor fixes and improvements
Improve note sharing screen Fix check list item buttons occasionally requiring multiple presses List editors of each specific note version Misc note editor fixes and improvements
Fix potential crash during upgrade to version 2.19 from earlier versions Improve handling of enter key in note editor particularly in relation to auto correct
Add support for scheduling of tasks to external calendars

Add embed options to publish note menu Tag display updates Improve handling of links to other notes Misc note editor fixes and improvements Add embed options to publish note menu Tag display updates Improve handling of links to other notes Misc note editor fixes and improvements

Improve sizing of note editor Fix cursor being obscured by note editor toolbar when typing at the bottom of the screen Improve publish note menu adding options for expiration URL customization and search indexing Start typing a note name in the Rich Footnote link field to quickly link to another note Pressing the sync status text in the drawer menu will list the notes being saved or downloaded Show mail to note option in note menu if enabled for account
Improve note status locked secure shared public display in editor Improve note menu Increase top bar button touch area Reduce app size
Misc note editor fixes and improvements Improve note details screen Clarify display of locked Vault notes Improve quick search results
Improve side menu usability in landscape orientations Improve memory usage and performance when uploading images Allow uploading of videos as Rich Footnote attachments

Fix restoring a note version as a new note displaying as an empty note Fix cursor occasionally being invisible in empty notes Fix animation hitch when creating a new note Speed up transitions into notes and between notes

Fix images inserted while offline not displaying after closing and re opening the note Indicate when a version was the result of a merge Misc note editor fixes and improvements Fix side menu not closing when tapping the menu icon
Implement viewing of past note versions with option to restore a version to a new note Paginate version history List existing tags when adding a tag to a note Misc note editor fixes and improvements

Fix auto correct and auto capitalize in list items Fix initial touch in note editor placing cursor at note start Add options to sign in with Apple iOS 13 and Google accounts Fix sorting of notes on quick bar note select popup

Open links to other notes in app Minor note editor performance improvements Allow for tag color selection Fix handling of return when adding tasks via quick bar Misc. note editor fixes and improvements

Limit tag names to lowercase letters numbers _ and Add option to include a comment when sending a debugging report Don t show task quick actions until editor is focused Add dismiss option for tasks that took time but weren t completed Show most recently edited notes first in full search results Use background fetch to keep notes up to date when app is in the background
Fix long notes lists being truncated if device is locked immediately after login and app is subsequently terminated Improve sync handling when device is locked or app is backgrounded
Creating a link with the cursor on a word will make the entire word a link Fix potential to get logged out after updating a note in the background while the device is locked

Add support for iPad Fix editor not loading in rare cases when switching to the app Update note content in the background when it s changed on other devices Speed up initial updating when app is launched after long periods of inactivity

The editor toolbar now shows the correct options when editing a Rich Footnote description Minor performance improvement while editing note content Remove excessive whitespace at top of search screen on some devices Add option to create public links when sharing notes Various note editor improvements and bug fixes

Add option to include a message when sharing a note Fix note history not showing up Expand quick bar note selection popup to fill screen Stop sliding the quick bar on and off screen when the notes list is open Enable OCR on uploaded images matching text in images when searching for notes
